patient_info: Nocturia,Proteinuria,Glomerulonephritis,Hematuria,Increased circulating IgM level,Elevated erythrocyte sedimentation rate,Nodular goiter,Chronic kidney disease,Pollakisuria
golden_diagnosis: Alport syndrome, X-linked,Alport syndrome 2, autosomal recessive,Alport syndrome 3, autosomal dominant,Alport 综合征/Alport syndrome/Alport syndrome,Alport 综合征/Alport syndrome/Alport syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Mixed connective tissue disease (MCTD)
2. Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE)
3. Membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis (MPGN)
4. Immunoglobulin M (IgM) monoclonal gammopathy of undetermined significance (MGUS)
5. Cryoglobulinemia
6. Endemic nephropathy with associated thyroid disease
7. Autoimmune thyroiditis with secondary glomerulonephritis
8. Henoch-Schönlein purpura (HSP)
9. Granulomatosis with polyangiitis (GPA)
10. Metabolic syndrome with renal involvement and thyroid dysfunction
